declare that the particulars furnished above are true and correct to the best of my knowledge.  I undertake to produce the tickets for the outward journey within ten days of receipt of the advance.
n the event of cancellation of the journey or if I fail to produce the tickets within ten days of receipt of advance, I undertake to refund the entire advance in one lump sum.
